content: the end of your row and slide it up to the needle tighten the knot continue knitting with the new yarn when working over an uneven number of stitches repeat the following two row cluster stitch cluster stitch is a textured stitch created row 1 knit 1 stitch purl 1 stitch repeat by wrapping stitches for this pattern it is these 2 stitches until you have 1 stitch left worked over a 4 row repeat and a multiple of your row knit the last stitch of 4 stitches row 2 purl 1 stitch knit 1 stitch repeat row 1 knit 1 stitch wrap 2 stitches knit 2 these 2 stitches until you have 1 stitch left stitches wrap 2 stitches knit 1 stitch of your row purl the last stitch row 2 purl 20 #woolandthegang eng row 3 knit 3 stitches wrap 2 stitches knit right-leaning purl 3 stitches decrease ø online video tutorial row 4 purl to make a right-leaning purl decrease you purl two stitches together through the back wrap 2 stitches of the loops holding the yarn ready to work knit 2 stitches transfer the 2 stitches you a purl stitch insert the right needle into the just knitted onto the cable needle loosely back of the second stitch on the left needle take your yarn behind the stitches then from left to right behind the left needle around to the front then around to the back then continue by inserting the needle into again and back in front of your 2 stitches the first stitch as well from left to right as your stitches have 2 wraps in front of them before the right needle is now parallel to transfer the stitches from your cable needle the left needle with the right needle behind to your right hand needle the left and both needle tips pointing in the same direction wrap the yarn and right-leaning decrease complete the stitch as for a normal purl ø online video tutorial stitch instead of knitting only one stitch at a time knit two stitches together insert the front increasing of your right needle through the first two ø online video tutorial stitches on the left needle then knit them make a new stitch by inserting the left together as a single stitch needle from front to back under the strand of yarn between the last stitch worked and left-leaning decrease the next stitch to be worked and lifting this ø online video tutorial loop onto the needle now insert the right insert the right needle into the next stitch needle into the back of this loop from right on the left needle knit-wise from left to to left then wrap the yarn and pull through right and slip the stitch onto the right as for a knit stitch needle without knitting it slip the next stitch in the same way now insert the left needle through both these stitches in front of the right needle from left to right
